dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October 1948
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes the joys and struggles of dealing with small children during their family retreat at Newburgh. Notes that they raise a lot of food but still are in debt to the grocer. Asks St. Joseph--"Through you, of course."--to take care of the bill.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 489 1948-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
